Lab.Description: In this lab, you will upload an existing Hyper-V vhd-file from your DC01 VM to Windows Azure. In this case, DC01 represents the "on-premise" location. After the upload, the vhd-file can be used to create a new virtual machine in Windows Azure, or can be added as a data disk to an existing Azure virtual machine.
Lab.Title: Upload VMs from On-Premise to Cloud
